structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
COUNTY EMPLOYEES' CIVIL SERVICE AND RETIREMENT

law.text: Any person who is an employee on the date his county first participates in the system, either in service or on leave from service, who does not elect within the time set forth in KRS 78.510 to 78.852 to become a member and thereby make contributions required of him by KRS 78.510 to 78.852, shall forfeit all right for credit for service with any county prior to the date he might subsequently elect to become a member, except as provided in KRS 61.552 or 78.530(3)(d).
law.history: Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 349, sec. 35, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 321, secs. 34 and 40. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 31, sec. 4. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 167, sec. 5.
